title: One of a Kind Luxurious Apartments at The Pearl !
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 598 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'In the heart of Koreatown, a rare, refined and opulent living experience awaits you.', 'A community built from the ground up, every community space and home has been designed with your health, wellness, and happiness in mind.', 'The Pearl on Wilshire is a best-in-class community crafted for relaxation and peaceful living.', 'A blissful residence that works for you – with thoughtful amenities, open-air spaces, amazing views from our rooftop deck, and premium unit finishes with upgraded appliances.', 'The Pearl is the perfect home for those that demand high-quality service at home.', 'Features:', 'Washer & Dryer in each apartment home, Brand New Layouts, Generous Closets, Modern Kitchens, Attached Garage, Patio or Balcony*, Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities:', 'Seating designed for any mood, Firepits with built-in benches, Social spaces designed to make you the "hostus mostus", Car Charging stations, Lounge in our cabanas, Two BBQ counter tops & Four Korean BBQ Grills, Uber/Lyft waiting area for residents and guests, Bocce Ball court, Indoor/ outdoor clubroom with pull-away doors for views of Waterfront park, Convenient and secure fob entry access, Space to work, Indoor fireplace and modern seating, Complimentary Wi-Fi, State-of-the-art 24 hour fitness center, Yoga and move space with Fitness On-Demand®, Bermuda steps for poolside lounging, Designer fireplaces to keep you warm under the stars, Three open-air spaces, Conference room to Host events, meetings or dates, Grab-and-go coffee bar, More than a pool deck, this is an outdoor oasis, Indoor/Outdoor exercise floor with poolside views, Clubroom (can be reserved)', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'n6e9RuzlM']
